title: Brookfield Raises $15 Billion Fund to Back Clean-Energy Transition
sub_head: The Brookfield Global Transition Fund invests in the transformation of carbon-intensive industries, as well as the development and accessibility of clean energy
body:
Brookfield Asset Management Inc. raised $15 billion for its first dedicated impact fund that focuses on investments supporting the transition to clean energy, including capital reserved for the firmâ€™s private-wealth channel.
The final tally for the Brookfield Global Transition Fund exceeds a $12.5 billion cap Brookfield indicated last year, making it among the largest private funds dedicated to the transition to a carbon-free economy.
